abstract: Louisiana State athletic director Joe Alleva says that embattled coach Les Miles will remain head of football team following 19-7 victory over Texas A&M.
lead_paragraph: After the Tigers beat Texas A&M, Athletic Director Joe Alleva said Coach Les Miles would remain at the university.

headline.main: L.S.U.’s Miles Will Remain as Its Coach
headline.print_headline: L.S.U.’s Miles Will Remain as Its Coach

snippet: After the Tigers beat Texas A&M, Athletic Director Joe Alleva said Coach Les Miles would remain at the university.
